title: 06/15/2021 - HOUR 3 - Kawhi Leonard, Kevin Durant Legacy and Ethan Strauss
itunes:title: 06/15/2021 - HOUR 3 - Kawhi Leonard, Kevin Durant Legacy and Ethan Strauss
description:
In Hour 3, Colin recaps Kawhi's clutch ability amongst the leagues best. Kevin Durant's legacy isn't in jeopardy if he doesn't win the title this year, but it wont elevate him either. Ethan Strauss joins the show to talk NBA playoffs, Dallas Maverick Organization and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
